issue.title: Add an option to set a respawn delay between auto-restarts

repository.name: pm2
repository.description: Node.js Production Process Manager with a built-in Load Balancer.

issue.body:
It would be nice to have an option to set a respawn delay between auto-restarts to avoid a fork bomb. This can also be used as a way to run a periodic process with some interval between runs (not possible through cron which uses fixed time points to launch a process).

CORRECTION: pm2 already has code to avoid fork bombs, but the ability to specify a delay would still be quite useful to provide a gap between runs for processes that execute iteratively.
